candidates.title: Release vulkano 0.11.1
candidates.body:
* [x] Added an entry to `CHANGELOG.md` if knowledge of this change could be valuable to users
* [x] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - in this repository
* [x] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - PR to the [guide](https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano-www) that fixes existing documentation invalidated by this PR.

Because I did a minor release of vk-sys that broke vulkano 0.10, that minor release had to be yanked.
This then broke vulkano 0.11, so I'm doing another release of vulkano and vk-sys.

candidates.title: Update crossbeam version
candidates.body:
* [x] Added an entry to `CHANGELOG.md` if knowledge of this change could be valuable to users

* [x] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - PR to the [guide](https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano-www) that fixes existing documentation invalidated by this PR.

Mac os build timed out, nothing to do with the dependency update, it was just intermittent.
So I ended up fiddling with the `.travis.yaml` to get it compiling faster.

candidates.title: Upgrade to winit 0.18
candidates.body:
* [x] Added an entry to `CHANGELOG.md` if knowledge of this change could be valuable to users
* [x] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - in this repository
* [x] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - PR to the [guide](https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano-www) that fixes existing documentation invalidated by this PR.

This has 99% chance of breaking macOS, due to upgrading macOS specific dependencies I cant test.
Can someone please test and let me know what other changes I need to do?
I'll also look into getting CI setup for macOS

I cant even read the docs for metal and cocoa which is super annoying! https://docs.rs/crate/cocoa/0.18.4 https://docs.rs/crate/metal/0.13.0

candidates.title: Release vulkano 0.11
candidates.body:
* [x] Added an entry to `CHANGELOG.md` if knowledge of this change could be valuable to users
* [x] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - in this repository
* [ ] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - PR to the [guide](https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano-www) that fixes existing documentation invalidated by this PR.

Looking to release this sometime in the next week.
I will try to review+merge a few more PRs before then.
I would also like to see https://github.com/tomaka/winit/pull/680 make it in.
If yours doesn't make it in, don't worry as I'm happy to do releases with breaking changes about a month apart.

candidates.title: Remove vulkano-shader-derive
candidates.body:
* [x] Added an entry to `CHANGELOG.md` if knowledge of this change could be valuable to users
* [x] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - in this repository
* [x] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - PR to the [guide](https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano-www) that fixes existing documentation invalidated by this PR.

Deleting the crate had to be done in a second PR so the vulkano-shader-derive deprecated version 0.11 would publish. I dont have the crates.io credentials to do it manually.

candidates.title: vulkano-shaders - proc macros 2.0
WIP: Use syn to construct ast in vulkano-shaders
candidates.body:
* [ ] Added an entry to `CHANGELOG.md` if knowledge of this change could be valuable to users
* [ ] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - in this repository
* [ ] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes - PR to the [guide](https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano-www) that fixes existing documentation invalidated by this PR.

I'm probably half of the way there, but figured I would throw up a WIP PR, to show that modifying vulkano-shaders is a good way to get merge conflicts at the moment.

candidates.title: Publish 0.10.0
candidates.body:
PLEASE MERGE https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano/pull/1012 FIRST.
https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano/pull/1007 would also be nice.

Will allow us to close https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano/issues/987, https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano/issues/1011 and https://github.com/vulkano-rs/vulkano/issues/981

candidates.title: Upgrade dependencies
candidates.body: I also changed vulkano/Cargo.toml to use unix newlines as that is what other files use.

candidates.title: Use shaderc instead of glsl-to-spirv for shader compilation
